title: Origins of characters in league
body: during classics class i realised how there is a lot of back story to alot of the characters and people they are based off. Some obvious ones are pantheon and the spartans, but then there is also some like darius and darius the king of the persians, and wukong and the monkey king in chinese mythology. I thought it would be cool if people could give some info about the origins of some of the characters in league, like who they are based on, some history etc.. basically how riot got their inspiration for their champions.

replies.body: i'm like 90% sure zed was inspired by the shredder.

There are a few champions I see that remind me of characters from other stuff. I'll just make a list.

Brand and Heatblast. Now, I don't know who came first but Brand does remind me of Heatblast from the Ben Ten series.
Speaking of Ben Ten, Zac and Goop. Again, I don't know who came first but Zac is basically Goop without his Anti-Gravity Generator. Hell, Zac's abilities are pretty much all Goop does, except for all the flying around that is.
Cassiopeia should be pretty obvious. I mean, she's obviously based on Medusa.
Fiddlesticks and Scarecrow. If you're thinking "Wizard of Oz" Scarecrow, just no. I'm talking about "Batman" villain Scarecrow, after all his whole thing is fear. Though it is a somewhat loose resemblance.
Lissandra seems to me to be pretty much based on the Snow Queen, the main protagonist of the Hans Christian Andersen tale "The Snow Queen", the same tale "Frozen" is (supposedly) based on (yeah right, Didney).
I don't know about you guys but I do see some resemblance between Malphite and Geb, the Egyptian God of Earth (if I'm not mistaken).
Nunu has resemblance with Emperor Sifrat XVI from Arthur and the Invisibles.
Shaco and The Joker. Yes, another Batman reference. But let's face it, it's entirely feasible.
Twisted Fate is obviously a rip off of Gambit from Marvel. Just look at the similarities.
Volibear and Iorek Byrnison from the Golden Compass are pretty much the same person.
Warwick seems to be based off Fenrir from Norse mythology.
Lastly, Zyra and Poison Ivy. Yep, another Batman reference. Let's face it though, same powers and very similar style.
Yorrick has his abilities named after the 4 horsemen of the apocalypse. Also I always thought some of the shadow isle champs were kind of based around this mythology, Hecarim being war.
People actually true and thresh and karthus were in it but not sure
The Ascendants from Shurima are a few pretty obvious ones based off of Gods and such from Egyptian mythology.
